info.name: EOServ Nightly
info.description: A dark grey style for EOServ forums.
info.additionalInfo:
Author: Tilly

Changelog:
* 01-Jan-2017 - Remove styling from subdomains. (e.g. forum.eoserv.net)
* 01-Jan-2017 - WebCP and EOMap icons are now greyscaled using css3 filters.
* 18-Nov-2016 - Icons are now grey-scaled using css3 filters.
* 18-Nov-2016 - Chromium patch for mainmenu & forummenu bg-color.
* 18-Nov-2016 - Published.
